data.message: You look handsome Eminem if you ever wanted to meet your biggest fan from NM I couldn't be more deserving. Let's just say I have paid my dues and survived thanks to you. Before our time is up I'd love to meet you. Maybe idk watch a recording session or just hang out. I'm anything but boring and I feel I can relate to a lot of your experiences however different. But you give me strength I didn't know I had. Thank you even if I don't ever meet you. Your amazing. Always will be.
